TopicTitle: Sure I've seen this somewhere before....

Articles.Content:
Hi, I upgraded to V1.02 but found myself waiting for the mods I like, to be upgraded to the same as my old FAR 0.90 game so I reverted back to that. However after building a craft with some B9 HX and other parts (I know this is vauge) but I am sure I have seen it here on the forum where a craft has lifted off with way too much propulsion and is still showing on the launchpad with zero acceleration and not ascending in the map view. I can actually fly to an enormous altitude with very little throttle and fuel loss but in map mode the craft is at KSP with no altitude!

I do not know if I have installed something in the 0.90 folder by mistake or whatever but the rest of my saved crafts fly ok.

I'm sure I've seen a similar thread somewhere but have trawled to no avail.

Thanks in advance for any comments, good or bad.
